name: Sweet Pensiveness Christmas
description:
DESCRIPTION:

It's night and you forgot to buy a gift for your son! Thankfully the city where you live is full of cheerful Christmas shops! But something unexpected will "overwhelm" you and cover your damned soul with suffering. Will you still believe in the "holy spirit of Christmas"?

I almost forgot... Merry Christmas!
